name: School Hero Festival
description:
Instruction:

You can play this game with mouse or keyboard.

Option 1: Click on the character icons with mouse

Option 2: Press q, w, e, space, o, p, and [ keys on the keyboard.

Description:

It is a rhythm game including characters from:

My Hero Academia

Mob Psycho 100

Love Live!

Osomatsu san

Fate

Undertale

Toho Project
